column6: NY kind of way).  We went with the Omakase the first time and told the waiter our preferences in food.  Though I tend to be adventurous
column7: my party was not.  Even with the restrictions (no pork
column10: our Omakase dishes were absolutely amazing!  The next few times we went we ordered al la carte and had a fabulous time being surprised by flavors infused into their dishes.  Presentation was also amazing and creative.
